moves.1. d4 d5: what can we do, to prove that a blitz game actually happened, and that you won? above we have the PGN notation, taken from a recent game... about the only way, to prove this game actually happened...
moves.2. c4 c6 3. Nc3 f5 4. Nf3: maybe, I should have given cxd5, cxd5, Bf4 a second glance; this f5 is trying to prevent a direct e4... but I was occupied with dxc4, and after that play the forcing e4...
moves.4... e6 5. e4: safer options were c5 or Ne5, but I needed blood...
moves.5... fxe4 6. Ng5: still nothing wrong with Ne5; but the exposed Black King made me wonder... I needed to conquer e4...
moves.6... Nf6 7. Ncxe4: having nothing better, than Be2, Be7, 0-0, 0-0, Be3, h6, Nh3, I decided to set the board on fire...
moves.7... dxe4 8. Nxe4 Nbd7: Nf6xe4, is already very dubious; for White that is... Black decides to consolidate...
moves.9. Bd3 Be7 10. O-O O-O 11. c5 Nxe4 12. B: by now, I had not much play left; but Black was starting to suffer a serious lack of time... so I decided to play 'va banque'...
moves.17. e4 Bd7: missing e5, b4 (we have to prevent Qxc5+), exd4...
moves.18... Rf8 19. Rf1: at this point, I should have played e5 myself; after Nd5, Qe4, I might have stirred up some more trouble...
moves.19... e5 20. Bc4+: at this point, Black was using up his last minute of playing time; I was losing but had minutes to spare: so I stirred up some additional complications; driving the King away from Rf8, thus pinning Nf6...
moves.20... Kh8: better Be6, Qb3 (Bxe6, Qxe6 doesn't make it any better), Bf7...
moves.21. d5: I needed another bluff... Nf6 is now pinned with the Black King on h8, due to mate; there is no way, to cover for Rf8 with a Knight move...
moves.21... cxd5 22. Bxd5 Nxd5: after Bb5!, Rf2 (forced), Qxc5, h3 (forced), Qc1+, Kh2, Ng4+, White loses the Queen and all is over... but Black was running on his last seconds; running right into my last trap...
moves.23. Qxf8+: no rocket science involved here: White is mating on the next move; Black resigned, just before his flag was about to fall... what did I prove? not much...
